Uses of Interface
com.cloudera.alfredo.client.Authenticator

Packages that use Authenticator
com.cloudera.alfredo.client   
 

Uses of Authenticator in com.cloudera.alfredo.client
 

Classes in com.cloudera.alfredo.client that implement Authenticator
 class KerberosAuthenticator
          The KerberosAuthenticator implements the Kerberos SPNEGO authentication sequence.
 class PseudoAuthenticator
          The PseudoAuthenticator implementation provides an authentication equivalent to Hadoop Simple authentication, it trust the value of the 'user.name' Java System property.
 

Methods in com.cloudera.alfredo.client that return types with arguments of type Authenticator
static Class<? extends Authenticator> AuthenticatedURL.getDefaultAuthenticator()
          Returns the default Authenticator class to use when an AuthenticatedURL instance is created without specifying an authenticator.
 

Method parameters in com.cloudera.alfredo.client with type arguments of type Authenticator
static void AuthenticatedURL.setDefaultAuthenticator(Class<? extends Authenticator> authenticator)
          Sets the default Authenticator class to use when an AuthenticatedURL instance is created without specifying an authenticator.
 

Constructors in com.cloudera.alfredo.client with parameters of type Authenticator

          Creates an AuthenticatedURL.
